item.title: 人工智能天气模型如何实现更精准的预报
item.description:
谷歌、微软和英伟达等公司正竞相努力，以期让预测在更长时间内保持更高精度。【原文：

Google, Microsoft and Nvidia are among the names vying to make forecasts more accurate for longer.

】

item.title: 太平洋投资管理公司首席执行官曼尼·罗曼谈日本债券与"卖美国"交易
item.description:
卷土重来？

【原文：

A comeback?

】

item.title: 零散交易：太平洋投资管理公司曼尼·罗曼谈"卖出美国"交易（播客）
item.description: 零散交易：太平洋投资管理公司曼尼·罗曼谈"卖出美国"交易（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Pimco’s Manny Roman on “Sell America” Trade (Podcast)】

item.title: 阿里巴巴计划为旗下AI芯片制造部门T-Head进行首次公开募股
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司正筹备将其芯片制造部门上市，借此满足投资者对少数几家企图在热门的人工智能加速器业务领域与英伟达公司竞争的企业所表现出的浓厚兴趣。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. is preparing to list its chipmaking arm, tapping strong investor interest in the small circle of companies aspiring to compete with Nvidia Corp. in the hot AI accelerator business.】

item.title: 万科重组临近，债权人对其计划仍存猜测
item.description: 万科正筹备一项可能成为中国史上最大规模的重组计划，但其未来数月内将有更多债券到期，债权人正努力厘清公司将如何处理这些债券。【原文：China Vanke Co., which is preparing a plan for a restructuring that would be one of the nation’s biggest ever, is leaving creditors grappling for clarity on how it will deal with more bonds due in the months ahead.】

item.title: 格陵兰养老基金考虑因特朗普撤资美国股票
item.description: 格陵兰养老基金正考虑是否继续投资美国股票，其首席执行官表示此举将是对美国总统唐纳德·特朗普企图控制这座北极岛屿的象征性抗议。【原文：Greenland’s pension fund is mulling whether it should continue investing in US stocks, in what its chief executive says would be a symbolic stand against US President Donald Trump’s push to seize control of the Arctic island.】

item.title: 日本债券暴跌仅因2.8亿美元交易量触发
item.description: 仅需2.8亿美元的交易额，便足以将日本7.2万亿美元的政府债券市场推入崩盘境地。【原文：It took just $280 million of trading to push Japan’s $7.2 trillion government bond market into meltdown.】

item.title: 布伊格牵头的财团正就对德拉希旗下SFR的新收购要约进行谈判
item.description: 由布伊格电信牵头的财团已与亿万富翁帕特里克·德拉希旗下的电信公司阿尔蒂斯集团展开尽职调查，拟就其法国业务发起新一轮收购要约。此前该财团于10月提交的首轮报价已被拒绝。【原文：A consortium led by Bouygues Telecom has entered due diligence with billionaire Patrick Drahi’s telecom company Altice Group for a possible new bid for its French business, after a first offer was turned down in October.】

item.title: 百货公司B&M再度下调目标，转型成本拖累零售商
item.description: B&M欧洲价值零售公司下调了业绩预期，因其转型计划的成本——包括清理库存——拖累了利润。【原文：B&M European Value Retail SA cut its guidance as the cost of its turnaround plan, including clearing inventory, weighs on profit.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚苏拉威西岛发现已知最古老洞穴艺术
item.description: 一项新研究指出，在印度尼西亚东部洞穴中发现的人手模糊轮廓，是迄今已知世界上最古老的岩画艺术。【原文：The faint outline of a human hand discovered in a cave in eastern Indonesia is the world’s oldest known example of rock art, according to a new study.】

item.title: 埃利奥特增持丰田工业股份，寻求更高收购价
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司披露，其目前持有丰田工业株式会社的股份比例有所增加。这家激进基金正推动丰田集团在将该公司私有化的过程中争取更有利的交易条件。【原文：Elliott Investment Management disclosed that it now owns more of Toyota Industries Corp., as the activist fund pushes for a better deal in the Toyota group’s bid to take the company private.】

item.title: 新世界机场商场面临新考验，租户纷纷撤离
item.description: 据知情人士透露，资金紧张的新世界发展公司旗下位于香港国际机场附近、价值200亿港元（约合26亿美元）的购物中心正面临新一轮动荡，多家租户相继终止租约。【原文：Cash-strapped builder New World Development Co. is facing fresh turmoil at its HK$20 billion ($2.6 billion) mall near Hong Kong’s international airport, as a slew of tenants terminate leases, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 凯雷集团正与L Catterton就标志性辛特拉度假村出售事宜进行谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，凯雷集团即将出售位于辛特拉山区的佩尼亚隆加度假村及酒店——这是葡萄牙最具标志性的地产项目之一。【原文：The Carlyle Group is nearing the sale of the Penha Longa Resort & Hotel, one of Portugal’s most iconic properties in the hills of Sintra, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 宝藏市股价大涨，投资者关注CEO访谈
item.description: 波普艺术国际集团有限公司股价午后大幅反弹，因投资者情绪受到提振——该公司首席执行官王宁即将接受中国官方媒体专访。【原文：Pop Mart International Group Ltd. staged a sharp afternoon rally as investor sentiment received a boost from an upcoming Chinese state media interview with Chief Executive Officer Wang Ning.】

item.title: 英国12月预算赤字收窄幅度超预期
item.description: 英国政府12月借款额降幅超预期，这有助于财政大臣瑞秋·里夫斯实现控制公共财政的目标。【原文：UK government borrowing fell more than expected in December, helping Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves in her bid to bring the public finances under control.】

item.title: 马来西亚维持利率不变，尽管存在关税风险，但经济前景乐观
item.description: 马来西亚维持利率不变，因其经济展现出对关税冲击的韧性，去年经济增长超出官方预期，通胀水平保持温和。【原文：Malaysia kept interest rates unchanged after its economy proved resilient to tariff shocks, with growth last year beating official expectations amid muted inflation.】

item.title: 英国和欧洲股市有望因特朗普对格陵兰岛态度转变而反弹
英国向南非提供10亿美元气候协议担保
item.description: 英国与非洲开发银行向南非提供了一项与气候相关的10亿美元债务担保，挽救了一项面临失效风险的4亿美元市政融资协议。【原文：The UK and the African Development Bank extended a climate-linked $1 billion debt guarantee to South Africa, saving a $400 million municipal funding deal that was in jeopardy if it had expired.】

item.title: 挪威电信以39亿美元将泰国True公司股权出售给Arise集团
item.description: 挪威电信公司Telenor ASA同意将其持有的泰国电信运营商True Corp.股份出售给Arise Digital Technology Co.，交易总价值为390亿挪威克朗（约合39亿美元）。【原文：Telenor ASA agreed to sell its stake in Thai telecommunications operator True Corp. to Arise Digital Technology Co. for a total value of 39 billion kroner ($3.9 billion).】

item.title: 印度航空在致命空难后面临创纪录的16亿美元亏损
item.description: 知情人士透露，印度航空公司去年遭遇致命空难及空域关闭，导致扭亏为盈的进展化为乌有，预计将公布创纪录的年度亏损。【原文：Air India Ltd. is set to report a record annual loss after last year’s deadly crash and airspace shutdowns wiped out progress toward a turnaround, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 香港崇光百货运营商寻求10亿美元贷款再融资
item.description: 知情人士透露，香港商场运营商生活国际控股有限公司正与银行商谈80亿港元（10.3亿美元）贷款的再融资事宜。此前数月，由于盈利持续承压，贷款方已放宽了借款条款。【原文：Hong Kong mall operator Lifestyle International Holdings Ltd. is in talks with banks to refinance a HK$8 billion ($1.03 billion) loan, months after lenders relaxed terms on the borrowing as earnings remain under pressure, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: EQT以32亿美元收购二级市场私募股权公司Coller Capital
item.description: 瑞典私募股权公司EQT AB同意以32亿美元收购科勒资本有限公司，以此在蓬勃发展的二级市场中立足。该市场是私募股权行业增长最快的细分领域之一。【原文：Swedish private equity firm EQT AB agreed to buy Coller Capital Ltd. for $3.2 billion to gain a foothold in the booming market for secondaries, one of the fastest growing segments of the industry.】

item.title: 俄罗斯黑海港口火灾损毁油罐致两人死亡
item.description: 俄罗斯称，周三深夜乌克兰无人机袭击了黑海某港口，导致四个燃料终端起火，造成两人死亡。【原文：Russia said Ukrainian drones hit a Black Sea port late Wednesday, setting four fuel terminals on fire and killing two people.】

item.title: 对冲基金在与三星证券的纠纷中寻求1.37亿美元赔偿
item.description: 总部位于香港的对冲基金Gen2 Partners有限公司正向三星旗下三家金融公司索赔逾1.37亿美元。【原文：Gen2 Partners Ltd., a Hong Kong-based hedge fund, is seeking more than $137 million in damages from three Samsung financial companies.】

item.title: 中国对俄罗斯液化天然气进口量意外激增，预示需求将进一步增长
item.description: 中国去年底报告的俄罗斯液化天然气采购量增幅超出预期，表明亚洲最大进口国的需求表现优于交易商此前预估。【原文：China reported a larger-than-expected surge in Russian liquefied natural gas purchases at the end of last year, suggesting better demand from Asia’s top importer than traders had priced in.】

item.title: 调查显示，诺特最有可能成为欧洲央行行长拉加德的继任者
item.description: 尽管其他候选人资质更优，但彭博社对经济学家的调查显示，荷兰人克拉斯·克诺特最有可能接替克里斯蒂娜·拉加德执掌欧洲央行。【原文：Dutchman Klaas Knot is most likely to succeed Christine Lagarde at the helm of the European Central Bank, despite other candidates being better qualified, a Bloomberg survey of economists suggests.】

item.title: 伦敦即将检验其IPO市场改革能否奏效
item.description: 历经五年筹备，伦敦金融城即将迎来检验其股权市场改革成效的关键时刻。【原文：Five years in the making, the City of London is set to find out if its equity market reforms can deliver results.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行计划允许更多投资银行家使用WhatsApp
item.description: 据知情人士透露，桑坦德银行正计划扩大允许使用WhatsApp的员工范围，此前部分员工抱怨现行部分禁令影响了业务开展。【原文：Banco Santander SA is planning to widen the group of staff allowed to use WhatsApp after some complained the existing partial ban is hurting business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国亿万富翁萨拉特深化与谷歌合作，加大人工智能投资力度
item.description: 泰国最大电力生产商、亿万富翁萨拉特·拉塔纳瓦迪旗下的海湾发展公司正深化其人工智能领域的扩张，该公司已与谷歌母公司Alphabet达成协议，双方将共同探索商业机遇。【原文：Billionaire Sarath Ratanavadi’s Gulf Development Pcl, Thailand’s largest power producer, is deepening its expansion into artificial intelligence with an agreement with Alphabet Inc.’s Google to jointly explore business opportunities.】

item.title: 卫浴巨头东陶股价意外受益于人工智能热潮
item.description: 日本卫浴制造商东陶株式会社股价创下五年最大涨幅，因内存需求激增提振了市场对其鲜为人知的芯片制造材料业务增长的预期。【原文：Shares of Japanese toilet maker Toto Ltd. gained the most in five years after booming memory demand excited expectations of growth in its little-known chipmaking materials operations.】
